welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oadby, a charming town in the United Kingdom known for its beautiful parks and gardens. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our local culture and enjoy all that our lovely town has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password for access.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for budget airlines and charter flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves both domestic and international flights. It has a variety of shops, restaurants, and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments, including perishable goods and oversized items.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Nottingham Airport caters to VIP and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The smaller terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited bandwidth and connection speed.
